Text:
Dude!  I have been looking for this for quite awhile!  Exellent choice for a first post.  Wasn't sure about the file type, but the good ol' DVDFlick was able to transcode it and burn it to disc. My boy has watched it twice already! Always a good thought to search for it before you post it.  Why have 15 torrents of the same thing, right?

Keep up the good work, and many thanks! Giving you a plus up : )
I remember watching this as a kid and even my dad liked it cause all the guest stars like Laurence Fishburn as cowboy postman with the hots for Evan.

There's an Easter Egg on this DVD, which contains the Commercial Bumpers used during the initial airing of this video.  If you like this, you might want that too.

big thanks to you for this
